column3:
There once was an elephant named Ellie.
ewline
ewlineShe really liked to eat peanuts. 
ewline
ewlineShe lived with a circus and performed with clowns.
ewline
ewlineOne day she was really hungry and could not find any peanuts. 
ewline
ewlineShe asked the lion, "Do you have any peanuts?"
ewline
ewlineThe lion said, "Sorry, I don't like peanuts, but the squirrel may have some."
ewline
ewlineEllie went looking for the squirrel and along the way saw a little girl.  
ewline
ewlineThe little girl was crying.
ewline
ewlineEllie asked the little girl, "Why are you crying?"
ewline
ewlineThe little girl, Ava, said, "I lost my parents!"
ewline
ewlineThe elephant put Ava on her back and said, "I can help you look for them."
ewline
ewlineThey looked high and low for Ava's parents.
ewline
ewlineEllie made a loud sound with her nose and Ava's parents came to see what it was!
ewline
ewlineHer parents were so happy to find Ava and so was Ellie.
ewline
ewlineEllie's stomach began to growl and Ava heard it.
ewline
ewlineShe dug into her parent's bag and brought out a bag of peanuts!
ewline
ewlineEllie ate the peanuts and everyone lived happily ever after.
column4: one: What does Ellie like to eat?
column19: multiple: Why did Ava dig for a bag of peanuts?
